history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 5 use: Related. unfold flip. intros x y H3. qsimpl time: 5 use: Related,flip. qsimpl time: 5 use: Related,flip. qsimpl time: 5 use: Related,flip. qsimpl time: 5 use: Related,flip. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros A R R' f H1 H2.
intros A' R R' f H1 H2.
intros A' R'' R' f H1 H2.
intros A' R'' R''' f H1 H2.
intros A' R'' R''' f' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type R, R' : rel A A f : A -> A H : Monotonic f (R ++> R) H0 : Related R' (flip R) subrel x, y : A H3 : R' x y X2 : Prop H1 : A -> rel Prop A -> Prop H2 : rel Prop A -> A -> Prop Unable to unify "Prop" with "R (f y) (f x)".

In environment A : Type R, R' : rel A A f : A -> A H : Monotonic f (R ++> R) H0 : Related R' (flip R) subrel x, y : A H3 : R' x y X2 : Prop H2 : rel Prop A -> A -> Prop X1 : rel Prop A -> Prop H1 : X2 -> rel (rel Prop A -> Prop) X2 -> Prop H4 : rel (rel Prop A -> Prop) X2 -> X2 -> Prop Unable to unify "Prop" with "R (f y) (f x)".

In environment A : Type R, R' : rel A A f : A -> A H : Monotonic f (R ++> R) H0 : Related R' (flip R) subrel x, y : A H3 : R' x y X2 : Prop H2 : rel Prop A -> A -> Prop X1 : rel Prop A -> Prop H1 : X2 -> rel (rel Prop A -> Prop) X2 -> Prop H4 : rel (rel Prop A -> Prop) X2 -> X2 -> Prop X : X2 -> X2 -> rel X2 X2 -> Prop H5 : X2 -> X2 -> rel X2 X2 -> Prop Unable to unify "R' x y" with "R (f y) (f x)".

original: intros. intros A R R' f H1 H2. unfold Related in H2. unfold flip. intros x y H3. unfold flip in H2. apply H2. apply H1. apply H3.
